item.description:
Lee Moody of Mohawk Paper Mills will speak about how to choose and use paper in print design. This will be a hands-on event: she will have sample promotions to pass around. She will also discuss recycled paper and industry efforts to enhance sustainability.

The event will be held on April 4, 2007. Please arrive at 5:45 pm for mingling. Lee will begin at 6:30.

Event Description:

Join us Wednesday, April 4th at Bentara in New Haven to listen and learn from an industry expert on the subject of paper, Lee Moody of Mohawk Paper Mills. Lee?s depth of experience comes from years of working with designers, printers, paper buyers, and the mills themselves.

Mohawk has been in the news so very much in the last few years; buying Strathmore, Beckett and Via paper manufacturers, and manufacturing recycled paper at three of its mills utilizing windpower from wind turbines.

If you are involved in or curious about print design, please come to see some beautiful sample promotions that show off print on paper along with many interesting pieces that speak specifically about paper and how it relates to sustainability.
item.name: GNH Design and Marketing Meetup April Event: Lee Moody of Mohawk Paper
